alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:39AM EST until January 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Steuben, Schuyler, Tompkins and Cortland counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin between 7 AM and 10 AM this morning. Snow will mix with freezing rain and sleet late this afternoon and evening, changing to all rain overnight. Snowfall amounts will be highest in higher elevation areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be found at 511ny.org, or by dialing 5-1-1.

area.areaDesc: Cortland; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates
